text: Ti o ba je pe nnkan igbadun (oro ogun) arowoto ati irin-ajo ti ko jinna (l’o pe won si ni), won iba tele o. Sugbon irin-ajo ogun Tabuk jinna loju won. Won yo si maa fi Allahu bura pe: “Ti o ba je pe a lagbara ni, awa iba jade (fun ogun esin) pelu yin.” – Won si n ko iparun ba emi ara won (nipa sise isobe-selu.) – Allahu si mo pe dajudaju opuro ni won
